Description:
Detects a suspicious child process spawning from Outlook where the image is located in a remote location (SMB/WebDav shares).

Author: Markus Neis, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Remote Child Process From Outlook
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%\outlook.exe' and process_path like '\\\\%'
